attributes.action: suspend the current selection  process of junior doctors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The flawed, on line selection of junior doctors should be suspended and a new fairer system put in place. A system that at least includes some references and a properly crafted C.V.
This scramble for jobs is chaotic, dangerous (who filled in the on line form?)and an unseemly and discourteous way to treat these highly trained and committed young professionals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
